name: PraisetheSun
0:
”Alexa, ask Praise the Sun to tell me one”
”Alexa, ask Praise the Sun to give me a quote”
”Alexa, open Praise the Sun and tell me a quote”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: praise the sun
des: While engaging in jolly cooperation you may look up and see the sun. As you do this you would wish that one day you could be so grossly incandescent. With this skill you can be further motivated to understand the wise words from the wonderful characters of Dark Souls!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
